price: 67 L’homme répondit : « Tu ne pourras supporter ma compagnie.
arabic: قَالَ إِنَّكَ لَن تَسۡتَطِيعَ مَعِيَ صَبۡرٗا

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: qāla innaka lan tastaṭīʿa maʿiya ṣabran
